fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This cannot spawn naturally.
- Your role is public.
- For every attack received, your defense goes down by 1. Powerful attacks reduce it by 2, assuming it wouldn't already kill you.
- Visits cannot go through you. (See 3179)
- You can't vote or be voted, and don't count to majority.
- You **can** be visited by players on either side of you, assuming that there isn't a second Barrier in the way.
- If you (a real player) somehow change your role into this, first off, why, secondly, all attributes do indeed apply to you. Also, you get the option to spawn a natural Barrier anywhere you'd like. And you can vote, ignoring the fifth attribute.
- The above attribute doesn't apply if you're not a real player (spawned by 3179).
